original_text: And it shall be, if the wicked man be worthy to be beaten, that the judge shall cause him to lie down, and to be beaten before his face, according to his fault, by a certain number.
korean_text: 악인에게 태형이 합당하면 재판장은 그를 엎드리게 하고 그 앞에서 그의 죄에 따라 수를 맞추어 때리게 하라

sentences.original_text: if the wicked man be worthy to be beaten
that the judge shall cause him to lie down
sentences.korean_translation: 그 재판관은 그를 엎드리게 할 것이고

sentences.original_text: and to be beaten before his face
